name: Case Simulator fo Standoff 2 D
description:
Warning : This application is not created by AXLEBOLT LTD and is not official . Created by Standoff 2 fans

Case Simulator for Standoff 2 is a simulator for open case and boxe , in the game Case Simulator for Standoff 2 there is the possibility of simulating battles in the background and getting gold and various items . In the game , you can open box , buy and sell various items in the market and on the market , craft new items from those that fall out of cases , complete unique missions . The game was created to test luck and the chance of items falling out of cases .
